article.author: Trevor C. Goodchild
article.summary_quote: twas a dark and stormy knight
article.body_1: Nicholas Krause is experienced with social media campaigns and has the ability to communicate  in an engaging and exciting manner to customers over the internet. Nicholas understands that a strong and consistent virtual presence is key to overcoming others in an competitive market.
